xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xpxRxNpx
xxxxxxxx
xxxQxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx


Bitset of all possible moves from d5 (14 possibilities):
xxx1xxxx
xxx1xxxx
xxx1xxxx
111o1111  xEF
xxx1xxxx
xxx1xxxx
xxx1xxxx
xxx1xxxx

Bitset of friendly pieces:
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxx1x1xx  x14
xxxxxxxx
xxx1xxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx

Bitset of enemy pieces:
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
x1xxxx1x  x42
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx



looking at the board east from d5: RxNpx

bitset all possible moves AND (friendly OR enemy) (d5 itself is included):
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx
x1x1x11x  x56 (x46 when d5 is removed)
xxxxxxxx
xxx1xxxx  x10
xxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx

for x46: x1xox11x 
  - c5 and e5 are normal moves
  - b5 and f5 are either captures or friendly piece blockers
  
for x67: x11ox111 
  - e5 is a straight move
  - c5 and f5 are either captures or friendly pieces


a5 b5 c5 d5  (d5 is always set since this is where our rook is)
0011	c5(?)
0111  c5(?)
1011  c5(?)
1111  c5(?)
0001	c5, b5, a5
0101  c5, b5(?)
1101  c5, b5(?)
1001  c5, b5, a5(?)

d5 e5 f5 g5 h5 (d5 is always set since this is where our rook is)
10000  e5, f5, g5, h5
10001  e5, f5, g5, h5(?)
10010  e5, f5, g5(?)
10011  e5, r5, g5(?)
10100  e5, f5(?)
10101  e5, f5(?)
10110  e5, f5(?)
10111  e5, f5(?)
11000  e5(?)
11001  e5(?)
11010  e5(?)
11011  e5(?)
11100  e5(?)
11101  e5(?)
11110  e5(?)
11111  e5(?)
